meanings.sent1: The dark, discomforting room made me feel uneasy.
meanings.sent2: The loud noise from the construction site was discomforting.
meanings.sent3: The discomforting silence during the test was nerve-wracking.
meanings.sent4: The discomforting truth about the situation finally came to light.
meanings.sent5: The discomforting feeling of being watched lingered in the air.

meanings.sent1: She had a discomforting feeling in her stomach before the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The child's discomforting expression showed his fear of the dark.
meanings.sent3: It was discomforting to see the cat trying to fit into a tiny box.
meanings.sent4: The discomforting memories of the accident haunted him at night.
meanings.sent5: The discomforting news of the storm approaching spread quickly.
